Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I've been experiencing hair loss in clumps, especially when I shower or when I wake up and find it on my pillow.
How long have you been experiencing this hair loss?
I've been experiencing this hair loss for about 2 months.
Do you have any other symptoms, like itching or pain on your scalp?
No, I don't have any scalp itch or pain.
Have you had any recent illnesses or high-stress events prior to noticing the hair loss?
Yes, about 8 months ago, I was involved in a motor vehicle accident which resulted in several fractures and a difficult recovery.

I don't have any information about a family history of similar hair loss or other skin conditions.

No, I haven't mentioned taking any medications or being treated for other conditions recently.
Final Diagnosis: Telogen Effluvium
